entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
